summary: Async Testing: Waitfor vs Act for Component Rendering
React Extension: Refactor Tests, Exports, Mocking Principles
Terminal Command Execution and Screen Clearing
TDD Methodology: Write Tests, Implement, Refactor Code

message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.

<user-memory-input>Always use TDD (test-driven development) by writing a failing test, then writing the implementation code
 to make the test pass. When the test is passing, refactor the implementation to ensure that it follows 
modern and idiomatic practices, and is easier to read and understand.</user-memory-input>
